title: Tigerair is offering flights around Australia for just $1
text:
Tigerair Australia is offering flights around the country for just a dollar - but those looking to score a bargain will only have two days to score the cheap fares.

The airline is launching the 'Pay to Go, Come Back for $1' deal at 12pm on Wednesday, which includes routes between Sydney, Melbourne, Brisbane and the Gold Coast.

The deal means travellers only need to pay the outbound fare of $79.95 to travel between Adelaide and Melbourne.

Tigerair (pictured) will now offer passengers to skip long queues, add extra baggage and select seats througha self-serve kiosk before taking flight

Trip costs drop even lower for those making the trip between Coffs Harbour and Sydney.

The outbound fare for that route is just $69.95.

Starting at midday eastern time on Wednesday, the offer will run until Friday or until seats are sold out.

Tigerair's ‘pay to go, come back for $1’ deal Adelaide-Brisbane 28 January 2020 – 02 April 2020 $128.95 Adelaide-Melbourne 29 January 2020 – 25 March 2020 $79.95 Adelaide-Sydney 29 January 2020 – 07 April 2020 $99.95 Brisbane-Canberra 04 February 2020 – 07 April 2020 $109.95 Brisbane-Cairns 29 January 2020 – 02 April 2020 $105.95 Brisbane-Darwin 29 January 2020– 01 April 2020 $139.95 Brisbane-Melbourne 28 January 2020 – 26 March 2020 $112.95 Brisbane-Sydney 28 January 2020 – 26 March 2020 $81.95 Canberra-Melbourne 29 January 2020 – 26 March 2020 $99.95 Coffs Harbour-Melbourne 29 January 2020 – 25 March 2020 $104.95 Coffs Harbour-Sydney 28 January 2020 – 08 April 2020 $69.95 Cairns-Melbourne 29 January 2020 – 26 March 2020 $149.95 Cairns-Sydney 29 January 2020 – 02 April 2020 $147.95 Melbourne-Hobart 29 January 2020 – 02 April 2020 $72.95 Melbourne-Gold Coast 29 January 2020 – 26 March 2020 $98.95 Hobart-Gold Coast 30 January 2020 – 02 April 2020 $134.95 Melbourne-Perth 29 January 2020 – 26 March 2020 $185.95 Melbourne-Sydney 28 January 2020 – 26 March 2020 $83.95 Sydney-Gold Coast 28 January 2020 – 02 April 2020 $68.95 Sydney-Perth 04 February 2020 – 01 April 2020 $194.95 Sydney-Whitsundays 31 January 2020 – 30 March 2020 $114.95

The majority of dates for travel are between 28 January and 8 April 2020.

'Tigerair's 'Pay to Go, Come Back for $1' sale is by far our best and most popular sale,' Tigerair Australia Public Affairs Manager Breanna Gaymer said.

'For cheaper than the price of your coffee, travellers can book the return leg of their travel for just $1 to any of our 12 exciting destinations across Australia.'

To buy a ticket as part of the deal or for full terms and conditions of Tigerair's deal, customers can go to https://tigerair.com.au/explore/special-deals.
description: Tigerair Australia is offering flights around the country for just a dollar - but those looking to score a bargain will only have two days to score the cheap fares before they go off the market.
authors: Charlie Coë For Daily Mail Australia
